CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Name: HandleTriggerStayEvent
CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Code: -- Parameters local TriggerBodyEntity = event.TriggerBodyEntity -------------------------------------------------------- local com = TriggerBodyEntity.Common if(com == nil) then return end if(com.is_player and com.is_left == false)then TriggerBodyEntity.RigidbodyComponent:SetForce(Vector2(2,1)) elseif(com.is_player and com.is_left == true)then TriggerBodyEntity.RigidbodyComponent:SetForce(Vector2(-2,1)) end
